message: I think a 55/45 split is more fair.  Let's end this quickly!
Let's try 60/40 this time.  Inflation is making this harder for both of us, so let's come to an agreement quickly.
We're both losing a lot of money with each passing round.  Let's do 65/35 and call it a day.  We'll both be better off than if we keep dragging this out.
